Gisborne cold case: Daughter Lynne Maree Martin on trial for Ronald Russell Allison’s murder https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gisborne-cold-case-daughter-lynne-maree-martin-on-Trial-for-ronald-russell-allisons-murder/USD2ANZ5JFCURFOEUGUSCRFM3Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gisborne-cold-case-daughter-lynne-maree-martin-on-Trial-for-ronald-russell-allisons-murder/USD2ANZ5JFCURFOEUGUSCRFM3Y/ WWII veteran Ronald Russell Allison died in a suspicious house fire at Te Karaka in 2013. Mon, 06 Nov 2023 07:15:45 +0000 Ten years after the death of 88-year-old Ronald Russell Allison in a house fire at Te Karaka, his daughter Lynne Maree Martin has gone on trial charged with his murder. The trial began today in the High Court at Gisborne. Photo / S Curtis, Gisborne Herald
Blocked view: Four-level mansion rising in front of $2m-plus apartments on Takapuna beachfront https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/blocked-view-four-level-mansion-rising-in-front-of-2m-plus-apartments-on-takapuna-beachfront/RZZUZ6OZFRCEHOJNTKHRVWQO5Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/blocked-view-four-level-mansion-rising-in-front-of-2m-plus-apartments-on-takapuna-beachfront/RZZUZ6OZFRCEHOJNTKHRVWQO5Y/ Anne Gibson'Suffice it to say, it was a tough outcome for that end of The Sands.' Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:39:00 +0000 A new, modernist four-level beachfront mansion, with a boat shed off the sand, is rising on a double waterfront site in front of some units at upmarket Takapuna apartments, blocking views from some $2 million-plus Sands places. Photo / Jason Dorday
